com.tangocard

Class TCStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tangocard.TCStore

  • public class TCStore
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to purchase TangoCards or Store cards and to get available Balance per account

      • TCStore

        public TCStore(java.lang.Boolean production,
       java.lang.String userName,
       java.lang.String password,
       java.lang.String company_identifier)
        Full constructor that sets up the store and makes it ready for use
        Parameters:
        production - Set to true to connect to production, otherwise false
        userName - The username portion of the credentials
        password - The password portion of the credentials
        company_identifier - identifier for reporting purposes, free text

    • Method Detail

      • purchaseCard

        public Transaction purchaseCard(int amount,
                       java.lang.String sku,
                       boolean send,
                       java.lang.String receiverName,
                       java.lang.String receiverEmail,
                       java.lang.String from,
                       java.lang.String giftMsg)
        Purchase a tangocard for a specific amount. On success will always return a filled in Transaction object. If the transaction failed, the returned object will be null. The flag send is true if TangoCard is to send the gift card directly to the receiver. If false the responsibility to communicate the card info to the receiver falls to the initiator of the call. If send is true, then receiverName, receiverEmail, from and giftMsg are mandatory, otherwise they should be set to null The value for sku is "tango-card" for the TangoCard, please contact your accoument manager for a list of other cards that might be available to you
        Parameters:
        amount - Tbe amount to purchase the card for
        sku - The sku of the card to send
        send - Flag to indicate if TangoCard should send the card to the recipient or not
        receiverName - The name of the person to receive the gift (mandatory if send == true)
        receiverEmail - The email of the person to receive the gift (mandatory if send == true)
        from - The entity (free form) that is sending the gift (mandatory if send == true)
        giftMsg - The gift message to attach to the gift (mandatory if send == true)
        Returns:
        An instance of the transaction class

      • getAvailableBalance

        public int getAvailableBalance()
        Return the balance available to use for purchasing cards
        Returns:
        The available balance for your account in dollars
